casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Christopher Jamme WHITFIELD
and
State of North Carolina
v.
Corey Levi Banner No. 282P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 30, 2019 Jillian C. Katz, Assistant Appellant Defender, for Whitfield, Christopher Jamme. Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender. Leslie C. Rawls, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Corey Levi Banner, for Banner, Corey Levi. Jonathan P. Babb, Special Counsel to Attorney General, L. Michael Dodd, Special Deputy Attorney General, Roxann L. Vaneekhoven, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th of August 2018 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Dissolved by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of January 2019."

Upon consideration of the petition filed by State of NC on the 30th of August 2018 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of January 2019."

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 7th of September 2018 by State of NC in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of January 2019."
